name: df-reflexive
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1
body: |- wb(wreflexive(c0, c1), wa(wss(c0, cxp(c1, c1)), wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0)))))
comment: Define reflexive relation; relation ` R ` is reflexive over the set ` A ` iff ` A. x e. A x R x ` . (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 1-Dec-2019.)
